## Summary

Course covers a smörgåsbord of topics; from all things nuclear, to crytallography, and finally through quantum mechanics. It will get increasing mathematical as the semester progresses. The emphasis will be problem solving and skills, rather than being heavy on volume and knowledge.

## Contents

1.  Radiation

2.  Nuclear Physics

3.  Particle Physics

4.  Crytallography

5.  Introduction to Quantum Physics

6.  Schrödinger's Equation
